nodes.text: A death stick was a highly addictive illicit substance readily found in the underworld of Coruscant and other locales across the galaxy. Delivered inside luminescent sticks, they were a favorite among desperate addicts and thrill-seekers. Death sticks were created from distilled and refined ixetal cilona, made from the balo mushrooms found on the planet Balosar.
Rael Averross, despite being a Jedi, sometimes used death sticks.

While on the planet Coruscant ten years after the Invasion of Naboo, and attempting to track down Zam Wesell, an assassin that had targeted the Senator Padmé Amidala, the Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi entered the Outlander Club in Coruscant's Uscru Entertainment District. Inside, he was approached by Elan Sleazebaggano, who attempted to sell him death sticks. Kenobi, however, used a Jedi mind trick both to convince him that he did not want to sell him death sticks and that he wanted to go home and rethink his life.
Though the death sticks are illicit substances, the Databank entry of Elan Sleazebaggano lists death sticks as a weapon.
